markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Skirt the Light](/Feats.aspx?ID=2514) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Fetchling" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=300" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 87 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You can travel the border between the [Material](/Planes.aspx?ID=1) and [Shadow Planes](/Planes.aspx?ID=11) and even bring others along. You can cast [_shadow walk_](/Spells.aspx?ID=275) as an occult innate spell once per day.
name: Skirt the Light
